
``set_default_feat_type``
=============================

set_default_feat_type

Description
-----------

set_default_feat_type

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   set_default_feat_type(gobject, feat_type = NULL, spat_unit)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``gobject``
     - gobject
   * - ``feat_type``
     - feature type
   * - ``spat_unit``
     - spatial unit
